metadata.title: CVE-2013-4942 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flashuploader.swf in theUploader component in Yahoo! YUI 3.5.0 through 3.9.1, as used in Moodlethrough 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before2.4.5, 2.5.x before 2.5.1, and other products, allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted string in a URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
